H0.text: Who in 1845, wrote the poem 'The Pied Piper of Hamlin'. Edgar Allan Poe

H1.text: Who in 1845, wrote the poem 'The Pied Piper of Hamlin'. Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

H2.text: Who in 1845, wrote the poem 'The Pied Piper of Hamlin'. John Keats

H3.text: Who in 1845, wrote the poem 'The Pied Piper of Hamlin'. ROBERTBROWNING

A4.text: Robert Browning wrote a poem called 'The Pied Piper of Hamelin', using the 1605 Verstegan version of the tale (the earliest account in English) and adopting the 1376 date. The poem was published in Browning's Dramatic Lyrics (1842).

A5.text: An 1888 illustrated version of Robert Browning's poem (Illustrated by Kate Greenaway)
